answers.answer: If your TSH is normal, then the next step for these relatively nodules may be an FNA biopsy -- 90% of nodules are benign - so don't worry until you have more information.

Thanks I think I was checked for more.  And I was googling reads abt graves disease seemed like I had some of the symptoms super scary !!!!!!! I know I just have to wait for the results but as a human being I get paranoid

question: Hi I'm 25 years old female I have been told I havre two Nodules in my thyroid gland one on the left one on the right the left nodule is abt 1 centimeter the right is bigger than a centimeter my test results for diabetes ,anemia and thyroid cambe back normal I am sooooo scared !!! They are going to do more blood work on me for thyroid IF normal I will have a biopsy what should I do I'm soo confused and lacking information and education
title: scared Mom
